ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Notes: e.g., Self-Report, Parent Form, Short Form, Revised Version

ElementDescription: Relationship of respondent to individual
Notes: 1 = Biological mom; 2 = Biological dad; 3 = Grandparent; 4 = Special education (sped) teacher; 5 = General education teacher; 6 = Occupational therapist; 7 = Speech and language therapist; 8 = Behavioral therapist; 9 = Paraprofessional; 10 = Aide; 11 = Principal; 12 = Administrator; 14 = Content teacher; 15 = Parent center director; 16 = Self; 17 = Adoptive mother; 18 = Adoptive father; 19 = Foster mother; 20 = Foster father; 21 = Grandmother; 22 = Grandfather; 23 = Step-mother; 24 = Step-father; 25 = Aunt; 26 = Uncle; 28 = Both parents; 31 = Grandmother from mother side; 32 = Grandfather from mother side; 33 = Grandmother from father side; 34 = Grandfather from father side; 36 = Brother; 37 = Sister; 38 = Cousin; 39 = Female caregiver; 40 = Male caregiver; 41 = Female child; 42 = Male child; 43 = Spouse/Mate; 44 = Friend; 45 = Parent; 46 = Significant other; 47 = Sibling; 48 = Son/Daughter; 49 = Son-in-law/Daughter-in law; 50 = Other Relative; 51 = Paid caregiver; 52 = Friends; 53 = Roommate; 54 = Supervisor; 55 = Mother's boyfriend; 56 = Other parental figure; 57 = Summary; 58 = Counselor; 59 = Other female relative; 60 = Other male relative; 61 = Non-relative ; 62 = Maternal Aunt; 63 = Maternal Uncle; 64 = Maternal Cousin; 65 = Paternal Aunt; 66 = Paternal Uncle; 67 = Paternal Cousin; 68 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Grandmother; 69 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Stepmother and Grandmother; 70 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Grandmother and Foster Father; 71 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Stepmother and Foster Mother; 72 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Foster Mother; 73 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Biological/Adoptive Father; 74 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Stepmother and Biological/Adoptive Father; 75 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Other; 76 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Stepmother and Stepfather; 77 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Stepfather; 78 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Grandfather; 79 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Stepmother and Foster Father; 80 = Biological/Adoptive Mother and Stepmother; 81 = Guardian, female; 82 = Other female; 83 = Guardian, male; 84 = Other male; 85 = Other/Grandparent/Nanny; 86 = Mother, Father, Guardian; 87 = Daughter, son, grandchild; 88 = Professional (e.g., social worker, nurse, therapist, psychiatrist, or group home staff); -999 = Missing; 89 = Biological parent; 90 = Other; 91 = Stepparent; 92 = Adoptive parent; 93 = Foster parent; 94 = Co-worker; 95 = Independent Evaluator; 96 = Legal guardian

ElementDescription: When I am caring for my child, I get feelings of annoyance or irritation.
Notes: 1=Very frequently; 2=Frequently; 3=Occasionally; 4=Very rarely; 5=Never; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I am caring for my child I get feelings that the child is deliberately being difficult or trying to upset me.
Notes: 1=Very frequently; 2=Frequently; 3=Occasionally; 4=Very rarely; 5=Never; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: Over the last two weeks I would describe my feelings for my child as:
Notes: 1=Dislike; 2=No strong feelings; 3=Slight affection; 4=Moderate affection; 5=Intense affection; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: Regarding my overall level of interaction with my child, I:
Notes: 1= Very guilty; 2=Moderately guilty; 3=Slightly guilty; 4=Not guilty; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I interact with my child I feel:
Notes: 1=Very incompetent; 2=Moderately incompetent; 3= Moderately competent; 4=Very competent; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I am with my child I feel tense and anxious:
Notes: 1=Very frequently; 2=Frequently; 3=Occasionally; 4=Almost never; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I am with my child and other people are present I feel proud of him/her:
Notes: 4=Very frequently; 3=Frequently; 2=Occasionally; 1=Very rarely; 5=Never; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: I try to spend as much time as I possibly can PLAYING with my child:
Notes: 2=True; 1=Untrue; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I have to leave my child:
Notes: 5=Usually feel sad; 4=Rather sad; 3=Mixed feelings; 2=Rather relieved; 1=Usually feel relieved; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I am with my child:
Notes: 4= Always; 3=Frequently; 2=Occasionally; 1=Rarely; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I am not with my child, I find myself thinking about him/her:
Notes: 5=Almost all the time; 4=Very frequently; 3=Frequently; 2=Occasionally; 1=Not at all; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I am with my child:
Notes: 2= I try to prolong my time; 1=I try to shorten my time; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: When I have to be away from my child for a while and I am about to be with him/her again, I usually feel:
Notes: 5=Intense pleasure; 4=Moderate pleasure; 3=Mild pleasure; 2=No feelings at all; 1=Negative feelings; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: I now think of my child:
Notes: 3=Very much; 2=A bit; 1=Not really; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: Regarding the things that we have had to give up because of my child:
Notes: 1=I resent it quite a lot; 2=I resent it a moderate amount; 3=I resent it a bit; 4=I don't resent it at all; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: Over the past six months, I have felt that I do not have enough time for myself or to pursue my own interests:
Notes: 1=Almost all the time; 2=Very frequently; 3=Frequently; 4=Occasionally; 5=Not at all; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: Taking care of my child is a very heavy burden of responsibility. I believe this is:
Notes: 1=Very much so; 2=Somewhat so; 3=Slightly so; 4=Not at all so; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: I trust my own judgment in deciding what my child needs:
Notes: 1=Almost never; 2=Occasionally; 3=Most of the time; 4=Almost all of the time; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: Usually when I am with my child:
Notes: 1=Very impatient; 2= A bit impatient; 3=Moderately patient; 4=Extremely patient; -99=NA; 77=Refused; 88=Missing

ElementDescription: Quality of attachment
Absence of hostility
Pleasure of Interaction
Maternal Postnatal Attachment Scale Total score
Over the past two weeks I have found myself talking to my baby when I am alone
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Not at all; 2=Occasionally; 3=Frequently; 4=Very frequently; 5=Almost all the time I am alone

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks when I think about (or talk to) my baby inside me, my thoughts:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Contain a lot of irritation; 2=Contain a fair bit of irritation; 3=Are a mixture of both tenderness and irritation; 4=Are mostly tender and loving; 5=Are always tender and loving

ElementDescription: The picture in my mind of what the baby at this stage actually looks like inside the womb is:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=I have no idea at all; 2=Very vague; 3=Fairly vague; 4=Fairly clear; 5=Very clear

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks when I think about the baby inside me I get feelings which are:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Very sad; 2=Moderately sad; 3= A mixture of happiness and sadness; 4=Moderately happy; 5=Very happy

ElementDescription: Some pregnant women sometimes get so irritated by the baby inside them that they feel like they want to hurt it or punish it:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=I have often felt like this myself; 2=I have occasionally felt like this myself; 3=I have felt like this once or twice myself; 4=I could imagine I might sometimes feel like this but I never actually have; 5=I couldn't imagine I would never feel like this

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have felt:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Very emotionally distant from my baby; 2=Moderately emotionally distant from my baby; 3=Not particularly emotionally close to my baby; 4=Moderately close emotionally to my baby; 5=Very close emotionally to my baby

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have taken care with what I eat to make sure the baby gets a good diet:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Not at all; 2=Once or twice when I ate; 3=Occasionally when I ate; 4=Quite often when I ate; 5=Every time I ate

ElementDescription: When I first see my baby after the birth I expect I will feel:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Mostly dislike; 2=Dislike about quite a few aspects of the baby; 3=Dislike about one or two aspects of the baby; 4=Mostly affection; 5=Intense affection

ElementDescription: When my baby is born I would like to hold the baby:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=The next day; 2=After a few hours for things to settle down; 3=After it has been washed; 4=After it has been wrapped in a blanket; 5=Immediately

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have had dreams about the pregnancy or baby:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Not at all; 2=Occasionally; 3=Frequently; 4=Very frequently; 5=Almost every night

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have found myself feeling, or rubbing with my hand, the outside of my stomach where the baby is:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Not at all; 2=Once only; 3=Occasionally; 4=At least once per day; 5=A lot of times each day

ElementDescription: If the pregnancy was lost at this time (due to miscarriage or other accidental event) without any pain or injury to myself, I expect I would feel:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Very pleased; 2=Moderately pleased; 3=Neutral(ie neither sad nor pleased; or mixed feelings); 4=Moderately sad; 5=Very sad

ElementDescription: Quality of attachment:
Notes: Calculation: sum([mat_antenatal_3], [mat_antenatal_6],[mat_antenatal_9], [mat_antenatal_10],[mat_antenatal_11], [mat_antenatal_12],[mat_antenatal_13], [mat_antenatal_15],[mat_antenatal_16], [mat_antenatal_19])

ElementDescription: Time spent in attachment mode (or intensity of preoccupation)
Notes: Calculation: sum([mat_antenatal_1], [mat_antenatal_2],[mat_antenatal_4], [mat_antenatal_5],[mat_antenatal_8], [mat_antenatal_14],[mat_antenatal_17], [mat_antenatal_18])

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have thought about, or been preoccupied with the baby inside me:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Not at all; 2=Occasionally; 3=Frequently; 4=Very frequently; 5=Almost all the time

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks when I have spoken about, or thought about the baby inside me I got emotional feelings which were:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Very weak or non-existent; 2=Fairly weak; 3=In between strong and weak; 4=Fairly strong; 5=Very Strong

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks my feelings about the baby inside me have been:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Very negative; 2=Mainly negative; 3=Mixed positive and negative; 4=Mainly positive; 5=Very positive

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have had the desire to read about or get information about the developing baby. This desire is:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Very weak or non-existent; 2=Fairly weak; 3=In between strong and weak; 4=Fairly strong; 5=Very Strong

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have been trying to picture in my mind what the developing baby actually looks like in my womb:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Not at all; 2=Occasionally; 3=Frequently; 4=Very frequently; 5=Almost all the time

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I think of the developing baby mostly as:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=A thing not yet really alive; 2=A living thing; 3=A human being; 4=A baby like any other baby; 5=A real person with special characteristics

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks I have felt that the baby inside me is dependent on me for its well-being:
Notes: 0=Prefer not to respond; 1=Not at all; 2=Slightly; 3=Moderately; 4= A great deal; 5= Totally

ElementDescription: I try to involve myself as much as possible in child care and looking after the baby
Notes: 0 = This is untrue; 1 = This is true

ElementDescription: I find myself talking to people (other than my partner) about the baby
Notes: 0 = Many times each day; 1 = A few times a day; 2 = Once or twice a day; 3 = Rarely on any one day

ElementDescription: When I have to leave the baby:
Notes: 0 = I usually feel rather sad (or it is difficult to leave); 1 = I often feel rather sad; 2 = I have mixed feelings of both sadness and relief; 3 = I usually feel rather relieved

ElementDescription: When I am with the baby: (enjoyment/satisfaction)
Notes: 0 = I always get a lot of enjoyment/satisfaction; 1 = I frequently get a lot of enjoyment/satisfaction; 2 = I occasionally get a lot of enjoyment/satisfaction; 3 = I rarely get a lot of enjoyment/satisfaction

ElementDescription: When I am not with the baby, I find myself thinking about the baby
Notes: 0 = Almost all the time; 1 = Very frequently; 2 = Frequently; 3 = Occasionally; 4 = Not at all

ElementDescription: When I am with the baby: (prolong/shorten time)
Notes: 0 = I usually try to prolong the time I spend with him/her; 1 = I usually try to shorten the time I spend with him/her

ElementDescription: When I have been away from the baby for a while and I am about to be with him/her again, I usually feel:
Notes: 0 = Intense pleasure at the idea; 1 = Moderate pleasure at the idea; 2 = Mild pleasure from the idea; 3 = No feelings at all about the idea; 4 = Negative feelings about the idea

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks, I have found myself just sitting looking at the sleeping baby for periods of five minutes or more
Notes: 0 = Very frequently; 1 = Frequently; 2 = A few times; 3 = Not at all

ElementDescription: I now think of the baby as:
Notes: 0 = Very much my own baby; 1 = A bit like my own baby; 2 = Not yet really my own baby

ElementDescription: Regarding the things that I/we have had to give up because of this baby:
Notes: 0 = I find that I resent it quite a lot; 1 = I find that I resent it a moderate amount; 2 = I find that I resent it a bit; 3 = I do not resent it at all

ElementDescription: Over the past two weeks, I have felt that I do not have enough time for myself to pursue my own interests
Notes: 0 = Almost all the time; 1 = Frequently; 2 = A few times; 3 = Not at all

ElementDescription: Usually when I am with the baby:
Notes: 0 = I am very impatient; 1 = I am a bit impatient; 2 = I am moderately patient; 3 = I am extremely patient

ElementDescription: When I am caring for the baby, I get the feeling of annoyance or irritation
Notes: 0 = Very frequently; 1 = Frequently; 2 = Occasionally; 3 = Very rarely; 4 = Never

ElementDescription: When I am caring for the baby, I get the feeling that the child is deliberately being difficult or trying to upset me
Notes: 0 = Very frequently; 1 = Frequently; 2 = Occasionally; 3 = Very rarely; 4 = Never

ElementDescription: Over the last two weeks, I would describe my feelings for the baby as:
Notes: 0 = Dislike; 1 = No strong feelings towards the baby; 2 = Slight affection; 3 = Moderate affection; 4 = Intense affection

ElementDescription: I can understand what my baby needs or wants
Notes: 0 = Almost always; 1 = Usually; 2 = Sometimes; 3 = Rarely; 4 = Almost never

ElementDescription: Regarding my overall level of interaction with the baby, I believe I am
Notes: 0 = Much more involved than most parents in my position; 1 = Somewhat more involved than most parents in my position; 2 = Involved to the same extent as most parents in my position; 3 = Somewhat less involved than most parents in my position; 4 = Much less involved than most parents in my position

ElementDescription: When I am with the baby, I feel bored
Notes: 0 = Very frequently; 1 = Frequently; 2 = Occasionally; 3 = Very rarely; 4 = Never

ElementDescription: When I am with the baby and other people are present, I feel proud of the baby
Notes: 0 = Very frequently; 1 = Frequently; 2 = Occasionally; 3 = Very rarely; 4 = Never
